scripts.update-data: echo update-subtree fetch-toronto-data fetch-state-data | xargs -n1 npm run
scripts.fetch-toronto-data: curl -L https://ckan0.cf.opendata.inter.prod-toronto.ca/download_resource/e5bf35bc-e681-43da-b2ce-0242d00922ad?format=json > third_party/toronto-data/toronto-covid-cases.json && git add -A && git diff-index --quiet HEAD || git commit -m 'data: update toronto data'
scripts.fetch-state-data: node ./scripts/update-state-data.mjs && git add -A && git diff-index --quiet HEAD || git commit -m 'data: update ny state data'
scripts.update-subtree: git subtree pull --prefix third_party/coronavirus-data https://github.com/nychealth/coronavirus-data master --squash -m "data: update ny city data"
